content: Dr Xiao Li | The University of Aberdeen Dr Xiao Li Dr Xiao LiPhD (Computer Science), MSc (Artificial Intelligence)Lecturer Accepting PhDs About Email Addressxiao.li@abdn.ac.ukSchool/DepartmentSchool of Natural and Computing Sciences Google Scholar Biography I am a Lecturer (Assistant Professor) in the Computer Science department. My research focuses on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning models. While studying the theory of how the models work, I'm also interested in the application of these models in different domains. I don't want my students to work too hard to be tired, I want them to have fun with research. Qualifications Ph.D. in Computer Science 2019 - University of Aberdeen Natural Language Process / Natural Language Generation Research Research Overview Basically, my research includes Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, and I mainly focus on the time series data. The example domains are: Natural Language (understanding/generation) Music Financial Data Research Areas Accepting PhDs I am currently accepting PhDs in Computing Science. Please get in touch if you would like to discuss your research ideas further.
